attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the support of our current Governing Body/Trust at Al-Madinah School.

The Governors have understood and acknowledged that mistakes were made and will do all that is in their power to amend things. We believe that as a team we can work well and with the right support we can achieve success.

The Governors should be given a chance to correct all issues that have been highlighted alongside all those that are required for Al-Madinah to be a success. They have the passion, vision and commitment to move the school forward.

The media attention has been biased and the demands have been unreasonable. No other school has been treated in such a manner.

Please sign and forward this petition. This is the future of our children and communities.
